title: Amendment to Soul of Jacobeh Proposal: Expand from Part Time to Full Time
body:
Summary/Abstract:  Propose to amend https://snapshot.page/#/rally/proposal/QmNg8FqwyFbbFpVazFzW5diZy1mWs2LQiZnC12GEwBfgy4 to increase hours for Soul of Jacobeh from part time (~20 hours/week) to full time (~40 hours/week).

_NOTE: The original proposal cannot be found directly on the Rally Snapshot due to the proposer's wallet not being in the Rally Registry for proposal creation. Thus a link has been provided to reference the original proposal._

In the original proposal, we proposed a part time role for moderating Rally community discussion. In light of a recent notable increase in activity in the Creator Coin & $RLY Discord, especially during the hours from 5pm - 8am PT, we seek to increase Soul's hours to keep up with this demand. and to be a voice for the community to respond to and educate the community at large.

Compensation for being a full time Community Ambassador is $4500 USDC and 50,000 RLY on the 1st of each month. After the 6-month term, scope of role and performance to be reviewed for continuation/renewal.

* A "Yes" vote will approve Soul of Jacobeh as a Full Time Community Ambassador.
* A "No" vote will deny Soul of Jacobeh as a Full Time Community Ambassador.
author: 0xBbD378951fB947eef963C096F46d04420F97905B
